title: Bug Splat & Check Internet
body: Every time I go into a game it either bug splats or tells me to check the internet. But I'm connected to the internet. And I don't know why my game bug splats. Any information on to help me fix my problem would be great. Thank You!

replies.body: Crashing with bugspalts at the load screen indicates a possible issue with your drivers, hardware, or game files.  You should go over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help out.  Test it out in a custom game to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hello Im having the same issue of consistent crashing as i go into the game and i have gone through every step and everything is fine, happend randomly yesterday, didn't even close the client between the game it happend. Thanks XD
